creator: hexuwei@hotmail.com
text:
i have a workbook file containing cells using chinese font.
when i open the workbook using HSSF and write to another workbook file,
the cells using chinese font lost the chinese font style.

creator: poi-support@buni.org
text:
can you supply the smallest amount of code that reproduces this and any input or
output XLS files?

creator: jheight@apache.org
text:
Confirmed that reading and then writing an excel file containing chinese text
will write correctly. This was corrected some time back and is available in SVN.

Jason
